typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(
DEPTNO=='10',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DEPT10, DEPTALL)
ConditionalSplit1@DEPT10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DEPT10'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@DEPTALL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DEPTALL'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
